description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"825uv","text":"The dispersed samples were shipped cold from PRODOLABS.
Prior to scRNA-seq, dispersed samples from brain dead donor’s pancreatic acinar
and ducts were dissociated as follows.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmomd","text":"

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4rigt","text":"The dispersed samples were shipped cold from PRODOLABS.\nPrior to scRNA-seq, dispersed samples from brain dead donor’s pancreatic acinar\nand ducts were dissociated as follows.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mm9t","text":"NOTE: Before beginning cell dissociation coat all the materials (pipettes, tubes, etc.) with stopping media to prevent sticking. Stopping Media: DMEM + 10% FBS + 1:100 Glutamate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"824tf","text":"1. Distribute specimens into 50 ml conical tubes, try to make similar cell concentrations across all tubes. *** Receive acinar in ~300 ml, should distribute into 12 tubes with 25 ml each***","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qud2","text":"2. Centrifuge acinar samples for 2 min at 230 g and 4C. Leave duct samples to settle without disturbance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0jud","text":"3. Wash samples 3X with 25 ml PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec2kc","text":"4.  Add 10 ml TrypLE E and incubate at 37C, mixing with a pipette approximately every 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2nke","text":"            i. Acinar: in TrypLE E at 37C for approximately 30 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du6q6","text":"            ii. Ducts: in TrypLE E at 37C for approximately 15 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drfa3","text":"5. To stop reaction, add 30 ml per tube of stopping media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egv4a","text":"6. Centrifuge acinar and ducts at 1300 rpm, 4C, 2 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4b8r","text":"7. To stop: add 30 ml per tube of stopping media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9amdn","text":"8. Centrifuge acinar and ducts at 1300 rpm, 4C, 2 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atfme","text":"9.  Aspirate TrypLE E and wash 1X with stop media. Aspirate then resuspend in stop media to (Acinar) 5 ml or (Ducts) 2 ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqgoe","text":"10. Transfer cell suspension through 70 µm filter then combine to 2 ml (Acinar) and 1ml (Ducts). Filter again through a 40 µm Flowmi.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mshs","text":"11. Count cells using AO/PI (acridine orage/propidium iodide) Cell Viability Kit for Luna-FL automated cell counter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pl96","text":"12. Proceed to cell fixation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Fixation of Cells & Nuclei for Chromium Fixed RNA Profiling
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ckdt9","text":"Cells were fixated prior to scRNAseq according to https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.[...] /v1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
